property.name: CallResult
property.description: The CallResult property will hold information for the result of the last method invoked. For static methods that do not have an associated instance, you can access this property using A5Storage::SecurityImpersonation::CallResult.

page.description: This class is a utility class used by other A5Storage classes to manage logins required. Some of the functions can be useful independently of A5Storage containers.
page.note: This namespace is primarilly intended for internal use. Some of the functions are documented are available for functions such as dynamically adding a network or remote Samba/SMB server share so the FILE object can use it..
